basic.description:
A study of genres and forms prominent in English-Canadian writing. Texts may range from the earliest writing in English in Canada up to the 1960s.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Canadian Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  A grade of C in 6.0 units in ENGL100 or ENGL110
